channel.title: Slayer points
channel.description: Alright so i made a system where if you complete a task you get slayer points and i was wondering how i can start making users use the points, such as buying a slayer staff with 40 points. Any hints on how i can start this? edit: buy items from a shop. I got the [code]slayerPoints = -10;[/code] down.

item.title: Slayer points
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

Make a custom “rewards shop” interface, see thing thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,421270.msg3093943.html#msg3093943

Example:

When you trade slayer master your custom interface opens.
You add two buttons, one saying Slayer Staff (40points) and the other one saying Slayer Helm (100points).
If say the Slayer Staff button gets clicked you just check if you have enough slayerpoints and if you do then just slayerpoints -= 40 and give item slayerstaff.
Should you not have enough points: sM(“You need 40 Slayer Points to buy a Slayer Staff.”);
Simple as that

Hope I helped.
